name: Evacuation (itch) (Pullsar)
description:
Introduction

Evacuation is a defense - management game in which we provide resources to a community that lives underground in a post-apocalyptic world and whose resources are about the run out, and at the same time we try to protect the Shelter against creatures. The ultimate goal is to build a spaceship and evacuate the world.

Controls Movement IRight Click + MouseMovement IIW-A-S-DZoom In / OutMouse WheelRotationMiddle Click + MouseInteraction Left Click

All key bindings & combinations can be found in the in-game menu.

Credits Authors

Pullsar - Programming & Prototyping
